TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PickBranch extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A potential path of execution within a activity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch> contains a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch.Trigger%2A> and an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch.Action%2A>. At the beginning of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Pick> element's execution, all the trigger activities from all <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch> elements are scheduled. When the first (leftmost) activity completes, the corresponding action activity is scheduled, and all other trigger activities are canceled.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch> activity. This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) sample.
[!code-csharp[wfs_Pick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_pick/cs/program.cs#1)]
